paper_abstract: We will completely describe the solutions of the equation (x+1)(d)=x(d)+1 in the field GF(q(2)), where q=p(k) and d is of Niho type, i.e., d I (mod q-1). Our results have applications in the theory of cross-correlation functions of m-sequences and in the theory of cyclic codes.
paper_title: The solutions of the third power sum equation for Niho type decimations
